# Gantt Diagram taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.error.permissions=You do not have sufficient permissions to modify this task taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.error.generic=Task could not be updated taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.error.readonly=This diagram is read only taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.error.notExists=Task does not exist taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.error.missingObject=Task class does not exist taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.success=Task updated taskmanager.gantt.taskEdit.comment=Edited through the Gantt Diagram UI taskmanager.gantt.task.noDueDate=No due date set taskmanager.gantt.task.unknownTaskTitle=Unknown Task taskmanager.gantt.macro.title=Gantt Diagram taskmanager.gantt.macro.wait=Please wait... taskmanager.gantt.macro.date.from=From: taskmanager.gantt.macro.date.to=To: taskmanager.gantt.macro.projects=Projects: taskmanager.gantt.macro.spaces=Spaces: taskmanager.gantt.macro.assignees=Assignees: taskmanager.gantt.macro.hideNoDueDate_0=Tasks without a due date are hidden taskmanager.gantt.macro.hideNoDueDate_1=Tasks without a due date are shown taskmanager.gantt.macro.noTasks=No tasks correspond to the given filter. taskmanager.gantt.macro.popup.progress=Progress: taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.quarterDay=Quarter Day taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.halfDay=Half Day taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.day=Day taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.week=Week taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.month=Month taskmanager.gantt.macro.viewmodes.year=Year taskmanager.gantt.documentation.description=The taskgantt macro draws an interactive Gantt diagram which shows tasks, optionally filtered by start/end date, assignee, space or project. taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.sectiontitle=Examples taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.readonly=enable editing through the UI (disabled by default) taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.start=filter by start date taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.startend=filter by start and end dates taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.projects=filter by projects (comma separated, escape commas in project names with '\\,') taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.assignees=filter by assigned users (comma separated) taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.spaces=filter by parent spaces (comma separated) taskmanager.gantt.documentation.examples.hideNoDueDate=hide tasks which do not have a due date set (default is true)
# Panel taskmanager.panel.paneltitle=My Due Tasks taskmanager.panel.untildate=until taskmanager.panel.fulltasklist=See full list taskmanager.panel.noactivetasks=No active Tasks taskmanager.panel.guest=You have to be logged in in order to view this panel
# Template provider taskmanager.entry.name=Task
taskmanager.extension.name=Task Manager Application (Pro)
## Used to indicate where deprecated keys start #@deprecatedstart
####################################### ## until 2.5.1 ####################################### TaskManager.StatusClass_status_InProgress=In Progress TaskManager.StatusClass_status_ToDo=To Do TaskManager.StatusClass_status_Done=Done
TaskManager.SeverityClass_severity_Low=Low TaskManager.SeverityClass_severity_Medium=Medium TaskManager.SeverityClass_severity_High=High
## Confluence-like tasks taskmanager.notification.statusChange.success=Task status changed successfully! taskmanager.notification.statusChange.restFail=Failed to change the status because of a server error! taskmanager.notification.statusChange.noId=Failed to change the status because the task doesn't have an ID. taskmanager.notification.statusChange.inprogress=Changing status.. taskmanager.notification.referenceGeneration.fail=Failed to generate a task reference taskmanager.notification.referenceGeneration.inprogress=Generating task reference
taskmanager.livetable.name=Task taskmanager.livetable.duedate=Deadline taskmanager.livetable.assignee=Assignee taskmanager.livetable.owner=Location taskmanager.livetable.completeDate=Completed on taskmanager.livetable.createDate=Creation date taskmanager.livetable.noRights=You don't have view rights for the document that contains this task.
taskmanager.macro.tasks.noRights=Some tasks have no been displayed because you don't have the rights to view them.
taskmanager.picker.taskpage.noValue=Choose a task.
rendering.macro.task.name=Task rendering.macro.task.description=Create a task that you can assign an user to using the mention macro and use the date macro to set a deadline. rendering.macro.task.parameter.status.name=The status of the task. rendering.macro.task.parameter.status.description=Specify what is the current status of the task. rendering.macro.task.parameter.id.name=ID rendering.macro.task.parameter.id.description=An unique identifier for the task, relative to the current page. rendering.macro.task.parameter.creator.name=Creator rendering.macro.task.parameter.creator.description=The user that created the task. rendering.macro.task.parameter.createDate.name=Creation date rendering.macro.task.parameter.createDate.description=The date when the task was created. rendering.macro.task.parameter.completeDate.name=Completion date rendering.macro.task.parameter.completeDate.description=If you set the status of the task as "Done", you should also set the completion date.
rendering.macro.task-report.name=Task report macro rendering.macro.task-report.description=Create a custom report of the tasks within the wiki. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.pages.name=Pages filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.pages.description=Display the tasks found inside the specified pages or in their children. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.tags.name=Tags filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.tags.description=Display only the tasks that are found on pages that have at least one these tags. This field should be a comma separated list of tags. e.g. "tech,blog,programming". rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.assignees.name=Assignees filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.assignees.description=Filter the tasks by their assigned users. The report will display the tasks that have at least one of their assignees in the users specified. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.reporters.name=Reporter filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.reporters.description=Filter the tasks by the reporter. The report will display the tasks created by the users specified. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.createdAfter.name=Creation date filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.createdAfter.description=Display all the tasks created after the specified date. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.status.name=Status filter rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.status.description=Display all the tasks that have the specified status. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.limit.name=Live table limit rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.limit.description=Specifies how many tasks should be displayed on a single page. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.columns.name=Live table display columns rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.columns.description=A list task properties that you want the table to display. The possible values are: name, duedate, assignee, owner, reporter, number, status, completeDate, createDate. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.sortBy.name=Sort By rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.sortBy.description=The column that will be used to order the table. rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.id.name=Table ID rendering.macro.task-report.parameter.id.description=An unique identifier for the table. If the field is not completed, a random ID will be assigned.
TaskManager.TaskManagerConfigurationClass_notSkippedFoldEvents=The fold events during which the task listener will execute.
## Kanban Board rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.columns.name=Columns rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.colors.name=Colors rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.colors.description=Define the colors that you want to use for the columns. The list must be comma separated, e.g., red,#00d126,yellow. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.columns.description=Define the columns that you want to display separated by a comma. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.name=Kanban board - Task Manager rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.project.name=Project rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.project.description=Show only the task that are assigned to this project. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.space.name=Space rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.space.description=Show only the task that are stored in this space. rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.user.name=User rendering.macro.kanbanboard.parameter.user.description=Show only the task that are assigned to this user.
## Incomplete tasks TaskManager.adminitration.incompleteTasks=Incomplete tasks taskmanager.incompleteTasks.find=Find incomplete tasks taskmanager.incompleteTasks.find.noTasks=There are no task macros with incomplete data. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.fixAll=Infer missing data for all tasks taskmanager.incompleteTasks.refresh=Refresh taskmanager.incompleteTasks.fix=Infer missing data taskmanager.incompleteTasks.job.finish.error=There was an error while trying to infer the missing data. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.job.finish.canceled=The inferring process was canceled. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.job.finish.warning=Missing data was inferred but some problems occurred. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.job.finish.success=Missing data was inferred successfully. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.find.inprogress=Looking for incomplete task macros.. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.find.done=Lookup finished taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.find.error=Error while looking for incomplete task macros.. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fix.inprogress=Inferring data.. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fix.done=Data inferred succesfully taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fix.error=Error while trying to infer data taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fixAll.inprogress=Starting inferring process.. taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fixAll.done=Inferring process started taskmanager.incompleteTasks.notification.fixAll.error=Failed to start inferring process
## Pickers translations TaskManager.TaskManagerClass_project_empty=None taskmanager.spacepicker.modal.title=Space Picker taskmanager.spacepicker.modal.close=Close taskmanager.spacepicker.modal.select=Select space
